section.46: The Book of Cutting off the Hand of the Thief

hadiths.text: It was narrated that sulaiman bin Yasar said:"Five (fingers i.e., the hand) should not be cut off except for five." Hammam said: "I met 'Abdullah Ad-Danaj and he narrated to me that Sulaiman bin Yasar said: "Five should not be cut off except for five." (Sahih Maqtu)
